actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: A bill to provide for the construction and maintenance of a fence near the international boundary between the United States and Mexico in the city of El Paso, Tex.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to provide for the construction and maintenance of a fence near the international boundary between the United States and Mexico in the city of El Paso, Texas, in order to deter illegal traffic. Authorizes to be appropriated not to exceed $50,000 to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the construction and maintenance of a fence near the international boundary between the United States and Mexico in the city of El Paso, Tex.
